Posts.Content: iT iS VERY OBViOUS THAT YOUR FRiEND iS SEEKiNG ATTENTiON. MAYBE YOU SHOULD HAVE A HEART TO HEART WiTH HER. LET HER KNOW THAT YOU KNOW SHE DOESN'T HAVE CANCER AND TALK TO HER. Posts.Title: Something is not right. Please Help.
